Question: This person then left PT-59, and returned to the United States in early January 1944.
Hints: In September 1931, this person was sent to The Choate School in Wallingford, Connecticut, for his 9th through 12th grade years.
As an upperclassman at Harvard, this person became a more serious student and developed an interest in political philosophy.
In July 1937 this person sailed to France—bringing his convertible—and spent ten weeks driving through Europe with Billings.
